sentences.en: "Were they at home or away, do you know offhand?"
sentences.cn: “他们在家还是出去了，你能现在告诉我吗？”

sentences.en: Consumers found the attitude of its staff offhand and generally offensive to the paying customer.
sentences.cn: 消费者认为其职员的态度漫不经心，对付款的顾客通常表现得令人反感。

sentences.en: He answered in such an offhand manner that I wondered if he'd misheard me.
sentences.cn: 他如此满不在乎的回答教我怀疑他是不是听错了我的话.

sentences.en: He was rather offhand with me.
He was very offhand with me.
I can't answer your request offhand.
sentences.cn: 我不能随便答复你的要求.

sentences.en: I can't tell offhand how much it will cost.
sentences.cn: 我不能立刻告诉你它值多少钱.

sentences.en: I can't think of anything offhand.
I wouldn't want to say what I thought about it offhand.
sentences.cn: 我不愿意随便说我关于这事的想法.

sentences.en: It is too great a thing for me to decide offhand.
sentences.cn: 这件事太重大了,不是仓猝之间就能决定的.

sentences.en: It was an offhand polite question.
sentences.cn: 这是一句随便问起的客气话.

sentences.en: Offhand I can't make a clear explanation ( of this point. )
sentences.cn: 一下子我还不能 ( 把这个问题 ) 解释清楚.

sentences.en: Offhand, I would guess that this car repair will cost US $ 1,500.
sentences.cn: 让我现在随口说, 我猜这部车要花一千五百美元修理费.

sentences.en: She explained it all in a matter of fact, offhand, neutral way.
sentences.cn: 她以就是论事, 随随便便, 不偏不倚的口气做了解释.

sentences.en: She said you were a bit offhand with her this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 她说你今天下午对她有点敷衍。

words.tran_cn: 即席地；立即地；不客气地
随便的；即时的；无准备的；即席的

trans.tran_cn: 不友好的，不礼貌的，简慢的
